thought: To craft black_carpet, I need to first craft white_carpet. White_carpet requires placing 2 white_wool side by side in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the white_wool from slot 31 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 1 with quantity 1
